0110001010011000 1100011100011110 1 -> sum: 0010100110110111, cout: 1
0110110011011110 1001110100010101 0 -> sum: 0000100111110011, cout: 1

0010100111000001 1110011110001111 0 -> sum: 0001000101010000, cout: 1
1010110101000011 1010001111000101 1 -> sum: 0101000100001001, cout: 1
0010101000111111 0000011001000100 0 -> sum: 0011000010000011, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
